dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic reigns supreme, two kingdoms have been at war for centuries.

dialogues.speaker: King Arin
dialogues.text: Enough is enough! We will not be oppressed by the dark sorcerers of Malakar any longer!

dialogues.speaker: Queen Lirien
dialogues.text: My king, are you certain this is wise? The cost in lives and magic could be catastrophic.

dialogues.speaker: King Arin
dialogues.text: We have no choice. We must stand up for our people and for the future of Eldrador.
